notes.title: Rena's Birthday Party Supplies
notes.text: Remeber to pick up Birthday supplies for Renae at Jackson Party Outfitters at 1:00 in the afternoon

notes.title: Johns Basketball Game
notes.text: Johns basketball team has thir first game tonight at 7:00 p.m.

notes.title: Sarahs Graduation Ceremnoy
notes.text: Sarah graduation ceremony will be held at Aunt Janes place on Wednesday at 7:00 p.m.

notes.title: Swimming Party Preparations
notes.text: Remeber to prepare the pool for the swimming party at 4:00 p.m.

notes.title: Parents Return From Vacation
notes.text: My parents flight will arrive at the airport at 3:00 in the afternoon on Saturday

notes.title: Trip to Hawaii in June
notes.text: We will be traveling to Hawaii on June 25th

notes.title: Find a Babysitter During Datenight
notes.text: Remember to ask stephanie if she can babysit our son on Friday Night
